overview_of_class: This course is a continuation in the field of taxation with particular attention to the field of corporate and business taxation at the federal level. Corporate formation and capital structure, corporate income tax, other corporate levies, consolidated tax returns, partnerships, and S-corporations are among the topics covered. Some IRS forms will be used, but the emphasis will be upon a deeper understanding of federal tax law.
name: Income Tax II
title: SCS ACCOUNT 308-DL-12 Income Tax II

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course is a continuation in the field of taxation with particular attention to the field of corporate and business taxation at the federal level. Corporate formation and capital structure, corporate income tax, other corporate levies, consolidated tax returns, partnerships, and S-corporations are among the topics covered. Some IRS forms will be used, but the emphasis will be upon a deeper understanding of federal tax law.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: ACCOUNT 208 (Income Tax I).

This course is conducted completely online. A technology fee will be added to tuition.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value:
The goals of this course are to:
-Apply the conceptual framework of the federal tax law and applicable financial accounting standards to various types of legal entities, including corporations, partnerships, S corporations, and estates.
-Prepare corporate, partnership, and S corporation income tax returns and estate and gift tax returns with the appropriate IRS forms, schedules, and related reporting requirements.
-Apply sources of corporate, partnership, S corporation, estate, and gift tax authority and applicable financial accounting standards to take tax positions.
-Evaluate data to determine income tax consequences.
-Apply knowledge of tax planning opportunities to wealth planning

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Spilker, B., Ayers, B., Robinson, J., Outslay, E., Worsham, R., Barrick, J., & Weaver, C. McGraw-Hill's
taxation of individuals and business entities, 2014 edition (5th ed.). Chicago, IL: McGraw-Hill.
[ISBN-13: 978-0077862350]

subject: ACCOUNT
